programme.title: In the Footsteps of Killers
programme.desc: David, Emilia and Dr Graham Hill examine the case of eight-year-old Vishal Mehrotra, whose remains were found in West Sussex seven months after he went missing in London in 1981.

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: A familys renovated French gite springs several leaks. In Spain, back-to-back BandB bookings and a busy bar leave a couple run off their feet. Lesley hopes a coach trip to a tomato throwing festival will prove fruitful for her Spanish tour company.

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
programme.desc: The duo return, helping families decide whether to stay put or sell. In Chippenham, Tim craves a fresh start in a new place, but Sonias settled. Will they move on?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Leah Charles-King helps Julie and Leo find the perfect holiday home on the southern Costa Blanca for all three generations of their family to enjoy. With a maximum budget of £120,000, Leah shows them five impressive properties.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Karen and Brian are taking the leap and following their dream of making a permanent move to the Málaga province in southern Spain. Leah Charles-King shows them what their £120k can buy.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Cheltenham, the first to host is 46-year-old Belgian-born hotel consultant Oli Delaunoy. Oli plans to wow his guests with his posh scallop starter and meaty main, but its his loud and vivacious personality hes banking on.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the second day of the competition in Cheltenham and the turn of glamorous nurse Jan Blomer to host. Jan hopes to impress with her good honest home cooking: chicken with sun dried tomatoes for her main and home-made ice cream for dessert.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Third to host in Cheltenham is super competitive events director and body building fanatic Zak Roby. Zak cooks Thai `Tien of Crab served with fashionable micro herbs and a duo of duck main.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the fourth day of the competition in Cheltenham and the turn of Aussie admin assistant Kimberley Thomas. She aims for a sophisticated evening, and hopes to impress with her meaty starter of pork belly and apple salad and her pie main course.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the final day of the competition in Cheltenham, and the turn of stay-at-home dad Paddy Castledine to host. Paddy plans to walk away with the prize by serving a simple menu with quality ingredients.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Shauna and Sam boast a wealth of top-end facilities at a Lancashire glampsite. With hot tubs, cinema screens and pizza ovens all on offer, the BandBers really do feel like they have fallen down some sort of luxurious, facility-laden rabbit hole.

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
programme.desc: Abi and daughter Maddys Victorian cottage in Surrey isnt working for them. Will Phils fabulous houses win them over, or could Kirsties amazing renovation clinch it?

programme.title: Food Unwrapped

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Britains sharpest armchair critics share more of their sharp, insightful, passionate and sometimes emotional critiques of the weeks biggest and best shows on television.

programme.title: Hunted

programme.title: Hunted

programme.title: Prisoner: Cell Block H
programme.desc: Ritas caring persona yet strong physique prompt Nora into considering her as top dog material. Lou begins her reign as top dog by asserting her position in the laundry and getting in a bashing on Reb as punishment for Joyces bashing.

programme.title: The Vanishings
programme.desc: After reporter Lisa Wallace publishes an article on her mothers murder, the killer resurfaces hinting at a kidnapping. Lisa and Detective David Burkely start investigating, connecting the killer to the disappearance of a women named Amy Reynolds.

programme.title: The Vanishings
programme.desc: Lisas article is leaked, criticising the Gardaí for not acting on Amys disappearance. David and Detective Brennan chase a lead, Mark Bulger, in Castlemoy. Impatient with the polices pace, Lisa risks her life to uncover what Bulger is hiding.

programme.title: The Vanishings
programme.desc: David tries to get a statement from Teresa and a confession from Bulger, whilst Lisa investigates if Bulger could be the killer. Susan pleas for information from the Gardaí, when an anonymous caller claims to have information on Amy.

programme.title: Cruising with Jane McDonald
programme.desc: On her first ever river cruise, Jane heads to Budapests Szechenyi Baths, before a visit to the moving WWII memorial, Shoes on the Danube Bank. Then, after a waltz and a wurst, Jane makes her way to her final stop of Passau, Southern Bavaria.

programme.title: Cruising with Jane McDonald
programme.desc: Starting in Vancouver, Jane cruises around Alaska, enjoying a dog sledding adventure on an ice field, visiting the Glacier Bay National Park, meeting the cast of the onboard nightly musicals and taking a cooking lesson from the ships executive chef en route.

programme.title: Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Canadas iconic Rocky Mountaineer train loops from Vancouver to the heart of the Rockies via crystal clear lakes, lush coastal rainforest, and the desert-like splendour of the Fraser Canyon.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben revisits global nomads Miriam and Peter in the forests of the Rhodope Mountains in Bulgaria, and discovers dramatic events have caused them to make adjustments to their lifestyle.

programme.title: Portillos Andalucia
programme.desc: In the coastal city of Malaga, Michael enjoys one of Spains biggest street parties known as the Feria. He also visits the incredible hilltop town of Ronda, and stops off at a vineyard.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: In Los Angeles to promote her new novel, Jessica learns her latest mystery has been appropriated by an unscrupulous Hollywood producer.

programme.title: Columbo

programme.title: Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys

programme.title: World War II: Secrets From Above
programme.desc: The longest campaign of the war pits the deadly stealth of the Nazi U-boats against the code-breaking genius and long-range bombers of the Allies.

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering

programme.title: The Vanishings
programme.desc: David and Brennan target Gough as the potential killer whilst Lisa tries to connect him to the kidnappings. Gill threatens to blackmail David if he continues his investigation of Gough. Lisa faces her worst fear with a hospital call about her father.

programme.title: Henry VIII: Patron or Plunderer?
programme.desc: In the 1530s, King Henry VIII was at a crossroads. In his desperation for a new wife and an heir, he had broken with Rome, divorced Katherine of Aragon and married Anne Boleyn. Isolated and vulnerable, he needed a powerful new image as head of church and state. Jonathan Foyle looks for clues in the kings art to glimpse what was going on inside Henrys head as he faced his darkest days.

programme.title: The Sky at Night
programme.desc: Three, two, one, lift off! This edition launches into the extraordinary - and extraterrestrial - world of astronaut training, discovering what it truly takes to become a European Space Agency (ESA) astronaut. programme.desc: Professor Phillip Goodman devotes his life to exposing phony psychics and fraudulent supernatural shenanigans. His scepticism is soon put to the test when he receives news of three chilling and inexplicable cases: disturbing visions in an abandoned asylum, a car accident deep in the woods, and the spirit of an unborn child. Even scarier, each of the macabre stories seems to have a sinister connection to the professors own life.

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.sub-title: Ghost in the Mystery Machine; Naughty or Ice

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.sub-title: The Legend Of The Gold Microphone!; The TV And Movieland Monsters!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!

programme.desc: Bing and Sula are planting seeds at Ammas when Coco arrives with her new skipping rope. Coco teaches them how to skip, with Sula picking it up quicker than Bing. programme.desc: Roly is digging in the garden when his spade suddenly hits something. Its a key. But what does it do? Duggee has his key badge, so they can find out through trial and error.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: While waiting to be picked up from school, Jack plays at being a sailor trying to find his way back home to Australia. Jacks dad, however, has got lost en route to collect him.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Mum helps Bluey and Bingo find ways to entertain themselves on a family road trip, while Dad tries to stay ahead of the grey nomad convoy or risk camping near the toilets.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: Ubercorn and Glitch head to the Svalbard Global Seed Vault, hoping to keep some seeds from Glitchs rare fruit tree safe for the future. But, just like when they were cadets together, the two of them get into trouble. Glitch accidentally crashes the Grimbler into the vault, and its hot engines start melting the ice that keeps the seeds cool. With the Go Jetters delayed by a malfunctioning Jet Pad, Ubercorn and Glitch try to save the scientists, the vault and Glitchs rare seeds.

programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Best Bowler
programme.desc: When Peter and Nutkins pine cone bowling rivalry gets out of hand it leads to big trouble...

Bing is tired too and gets upset when he thinks theres nowhere left for him to sleep, but Flop and Padget find a solution.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say hat. See lots of different hats including a small hat, a big hat and even a woolly pink pig hat! Theres a pretty flower hat and a funny tower hat. The journey is repeated with some special surprises along the way.

programme.desc: Justin and his friends visit the cinema to watch a very special funny film. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble directs his own film with a little help from all of his toys!

programme.desc: Giovanna and Baby Bear welcome babies Amelia, Amber, Connor, Leo, Lincoln, Remi and their grown-ups. Inside everyones bags are carrots which are explored through discovery, play, song and story.

programme.title: Maddie and Triggs
programme.desc: Maddies fun and games are temporarily stopped when Triggs incredibly waggy tail starts accidentally knocking things over - its almost like his waggy tail has a life of its own!

programme.title: Dylans Playtime Adventures
programme.desc: Dylan the deep-sea diver wants to take a picture of the deepest darkest bottom of the sea, but when he discovers its too dark for his camera, he turns to a new friend.

programme.title: Kiri and Lou

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger the Tricarrotops explores the world of the crunchiest era, going on adventures throughout the colourful Vegesaur Valley.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Its lunchtime on Blueys back deck. But every BBQ needs a side salad, so Bingos relaxing sit-down will have to wait until she finds every colour of pepper her cousins want.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels are confused when they see Duggee sitting on a ball because they like to use it differently. Duggee is quick to explain to the Squirrels that there is no right or wrong way to play and that everyone is different.

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.sub-title: We Cant See You in the Dark
programme.desc: The Game Catchers land on the planet Pumpkin, where streets, houses, bridges, trees and even children are shaped like pumpkins.

programme.title: Roots and Fruits
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its Plum performing the Sugar Plum Fairy Bounce and attempting to do not one, not two, but three pirouettes in midair.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: When Timmy sees Otus flutter up to get a kite down from a tree, he is very impressed. Determined to fly himself, Timmy gets Otus to show him how its done. However, its not as easy as it looks and he is about to give up before his friends find a special way to make him fly.

programme.title: Our Family
programme.desc: Chef Audrey loves to cook and makes a delicious pizza for the whole family. Later, the family has a game of snakes and ladders. Its a close-run thing with lots of ups and downs.

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Naimas family are from Algeria. Naima is cooking a special Algerian borek for her friends to try. Borek is made from pastry, mashed potato, meat, cheese and olives. The great thing about borek is that you can add lots of different ingredients depending on what you like, and thats exactly what Naima is doing today. Naima mashes her potatoes, cuts some spring onions and sprinkles in some cinnamon before she gets the table ready for her Algerian feast.

programme.title: Ferne and Rorys Teeny Tiny Creatures
programme.desc: Rishaan finds out all about his favourite teeny tiny creature - the hedgehog. Chantelle meets Kyra and Sophie, two young, passionate hedgehog rescuers, while Rory and his son Sandy are in their garden finding ways to spot hedgehogs.

programme.title: Whats in Your Bag?
programme.desc: Canoeist Jack, who has raced in competitions all around the world, talks about how his paddles help him move quickly through the water.

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: The class is making fruit kebabs, so they go on a trip to a local supermarket to buy the ingredients. Will Leon be able to find his favourite fruit - a big melon?

programme.title: Graces Amazing Machines
programme.desc: Motorbike rider Grace shows off three amazing machines that are all designed to race. Grace drives a rally car in the forest, shows off some incredible racing trucks and then has an actual race in a Stoxkart.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say `egg and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different eggs, a brown egg, a white egg, we even see inside an egg. Theres a dippy egg, a fried egg, an egg being laid and what will come out of the hatching egg? Theres a gold egg, a cold egg and Dee and her friends even have an egg and spoon race.

Along the way, he meets a grasshopper mouse and escapes a pack of hungry harris hawks.

When he sees Evie and Simon playing in the garden, he feels left out and begins to woof and woof. Simon tells Waffle to rest quietly, but its too late. The wonder dogs incessant barking has already disturbed Mrs Hobbs next door and, to make matters worse, like Waffle shes not feeling well either.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray and Debra try to decide who should care for their children in case anything should happen to them.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debras hippie sister turns up to announce that she has decided to become a nun.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray is upset when Debra says he is just like his cousin Gerard, and he thinks it would be a good idea to turn to his family for reassurance.

programme.sub-title: The Mayor Who Came to Dinner
programme.desc: The mayor separates from his wife and moves in with Mike; Isaac Mizrahi helps the mayors office with a charity fashion show.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: The mayor decides to take a road trip with Paul after receiving his divorce papers, and leaves Mike in charge of New York City.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mike is relieved when his new girlfriend says she doesnt want a commitment, and James has a mysterious new hobby.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Michael tries to dissuade the mayor from having a relationship with a young woman, and Paul acts as Michaels assistant.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: After weeks of procrastinating, Rachel finally takes down the Christmas lights, but sprains her ankle.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Poker
programme.desc: When the girls lose money to the guys in a poker match they seek out Monicas Aunt Iris, a famous card player, for lessons in poker and demand a rematch.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where the Monkey Gets Away
programme.desc: Rachel accidentally lets Ross pet monkey escape, and the friends form a search party. She is then horrified to learn that her former best friend is engaged to marry her ex-fiance.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Evil Orthodontist
programme.desc: Rachel gets back together with her ex-fiance Barry, even though hes engaged to her best friend Mindy. Meanwhile, Chandler agonises over a wonderful woman who fails to call him after their first date.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Fake Monica
programme.desc: Someone is pretending to be Monica, using her credit card numbers and having the sort of fun that Monica wishes she could have.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Ick Factor
programme.desc: Monica discovers that shes developed a highly mature approach to her latest love affair, and Ross finds out that hes being mistaken for a male prostitute.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: When Carol gives birth, Ross and Susan almost miss the event when Phoebe accidentally locks them in a cupboard together to put a stop to their constant bickering. Meanwhile, Joey befriends an unmarried pregnant woman and ends up helping her to give birth.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachel Finds Out
programme.desc: Ross has been in love with Rachel since ninth grade but has always kept it a secret. Now the truth accidentally comes out, but as Rachel rushes to the airport to greet Ross on his return from a business trip, she discovers that work is not all hes been getting up to while hes been away.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rosss New Girlfriend
programme.desc: Ross comes back from China with his new girlfriend Julie, and Rachel has a really hard time dealing with it. She winds up sleeping with Paolo and hates herself for it. Joey persuades her to tell Ross how she feels, but when Ross tells her he is in love with Julie, she cant bring herself to do it.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Breast Milk
programme.desc: While Carol and Susan are away, Ross and the friends babysit his newborn son Ben, but Ross is disgusted when Phoebe tests the temperature of some bottled breast milk on her wrist. Meanwhile, Joey competes with a fellow cologne salesman.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: When downstairs neighbour Mr Heckles dies, the friends clean out his apartment, but Chandler becomes convinced his hyper-critical nature will mean he ends up alone and sad, just like Heckles.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Everyone is surprised when Phoebes husband - a gay Canadian ice dancer - shows up, as nobody knew she was married. Elsewhere, Chandler reveals his third nipple, and Ross new relationship is under attack, unbeknown to him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Five Steaks and an Eggplant
programme.desc: Monica gets promoted and invites the friends out for dinner to celebrate, but problems arise when the difference in their salaries becomes apparent and the group splits in two. Meanwhile, when Chandler sets a woman up to get a date with her, a case of mistaken identities means that he discovers what she really thought of him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Baby on the Bus
programme.desc: Joey and Chandler babysit Ben, who turns out to be a babe-magnet until they accidentally leave him on a bus. Meanwhile, Phoebe loses her job as the singer at Central Perk to Stephanie.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Finds Out
programme.desc: Ross and Julie announce they are getting a cat together, while Rachel gets drunk on a date and all she talks about is Ross. She decides to get closure by calling him and telling his machine she is over him. Meanwhile, Chandler regrets asking Monica to help him lose weight.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross agonises over whether he should stay with Julie or date Rachel. The gang encourage him to compare the two, so he starts with a list of Rachels negative qualities. Unfortunately, Rachel sees the list.

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Maisie Adam, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Vogue Williams
programme.desc: ...Internet. Iain is joined by Maisie Adam, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Vogue Williams to rip into embarrassing TikToks, confusing challenges and painfully awkward posts. (S1, E07)

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: Bradley and Barney continue their European adventure in Poland. The boys take in a spot of sightseeing in Krakow, before they don wetsuits and head to a freezing cold lake to try out water blobbing. Next up, they come face to face with mans best friend as Brad gets chased by an attack dog. All before Barney treats his dad to an exclusive performance with the Polish National Radio Symphony Orchestra in honour of Polands most famous composer, Chopin.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: Bradley and Barney arrive in Denmark for the Scandinavian leg of their tour. Bradleys fear of heights is pushed to the limit with a visit to an offshore wind turbine, and the boys test both of their boundaries with a visit to the worlds tallest indoor rope course.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.desc: Nicki Chapman heads to Northern Ireland with a husband and wife who have £500,000 to find a large family home where they can also keep animals and welcome paying guests. programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jules Hudson is in the Dorset countryside helping a couple make the move from Queensland, Australia to family roots back in the UK. With a budget of £450,000, they look forward to enjoying village life in cooler climes. Jules also visits Tout quarry on the Isle of Portland, now home to a unique sculpture park celebrating the heritage of Portland stone, which was used for many of Londons historic buildings.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew visits a disused fuel shed on a former air force base in Suffolk, where he discovers vases carved from cow bones and a haunting stone face corbel.

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: In East Lothian, Sarah Moore explores Wallyford Recycling Centre, determined to save quality items from hitting the skips. She earmarks a collection of teak architraves for lighting designer Duncan McKean, a sewing machine table in need of attention is sent to newcomer Martin Hough, and Sarah needs to come up with a creative use for an assortment of fabric before trying to sell the items on for a profit.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques experts travel across the nation to search for hidden treasures, from household items to one-of-a kind collectibles. The experts then head to auction to battle it out and make the biggest profit from their items.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Long Lost Family: Born Without Trace
programme.desc: Foundlings are people who were abandoned as babies, often in the first hours and days of their lives. Born without a trace, they have had no way to unlock the secrets of their past. By combining new DNA technology with painstaking detective work, the mysteries of people with unknown beginnings who are desperate for answers can now be solved. Presented by Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell, the team behind `Long Lost Family use an extraordinary new technique to try and identify birth families and find answers for people who have spent decades trying to find out where they came from.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: A search on behalf of Kate Brown from Portsmouth takes on twists and turns and unveils one missing relative after another. Kate Brown with a foster family and the closest thing she had to a blood relative was her foster brother John who she was very close to but while Kate was eventually adopted by the foster family John was sent back to the care system. Ever since Kate has been on a mission to find him and during her research she made an unexpected discovery.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: A man whose only memento of his birth mother and siblings is an old local newspaper article, which shows them evicted from their home and squatting in an airfield. A mother searching for her only child, who she hasnt seen since he was ten days old.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Medieval fantasy based on George RR Martins best-selling book.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: As Mount Vesuvius rains down lava and ash, a gladiator (Kit Harington) races to save the woman (Emily Browning) he loves before the city collapses.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Antiheroes
programme.desc: From Dirty Harry and The Godfather to the deeply imperfect gang from the Fast and the Furious franchise, this Cinema List celebrates our favourite anti-heroes.

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Following the death of his friend, Bobby decides to leave the army but he is soon asked to come back into action in order to help prevent the assassination of the President.

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: When his daughter is brutally murdered and legal justice looks unlikely, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands, setting out on a quest for retribution.

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: The cynical commander of Allied Nations forces has to prevent a warlord from taking over the world. With 63 hostages held in his seemingly impregnable fortress, the warlord is demanding an outrageously hefty ransom.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on the botched mission during Americas military involvement in Somalia in the early 1990s. An attempt by US Army Rangers parachuted into Mogadishu to capture a warlords two top lieutenants goes disastrously wrong when two helicopters are shot down.

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Following the death of his friend, Bobby decides to leave the army but he is soon asked to come back into action in order to help prevent the assassination of the President.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: The evil mummy Imhotep returns to wreak havoc as he resumes his relentless search for power and immortality. To make matters worse, another ancient evil has been unleashed, even more dangerous than Imhotep. Only the heroic Rick OConnell and his intrepid Egyptologist wife stand in the way of these twin terrors as they embark upon a desperate mission to save the world.

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: In a time before the pyramids, an evil king threatens to take over the world, so the leaders of the remaining tribes under threat call upon a desert warrior to help them defeat the wicked one and his brutal hordes. As the warrior battles against the evil around him, he is preparing for a final showdown that will decide if it is to be his destiny to become the great Scorpion King.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old mans notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: The cynical commander of Allied Nations forces has to prevent a warlord from taking over the world. With 63 hostages held in his seemingly impregnable fortress, the warlord is demanding an outrageously hefty ransom.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Roland Deschain, the last Gunslinger, must prevent the Man in Black from toppling the Dark Tower, the key that holds the universe together.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: The Green Hornet

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: The story of a wild mustang stallion captured by horse traders and sold to a cavalry regiment at a frontier outpost, where a cruel colonel attempts to break the free-spirited horse. However, he escapes in the company of a Native American youth and embarks upon a series of adventures in the harsh and unforgiving times of the Old West.

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two rogues stumble across a map of the treasures of El Dorado and stow away on an explorers ship bound for South America, where they are mistaken for gods due to their foreign complexions. Narrated by Elton John, who provided the music to Tim Rices lyrics.

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
programme.desc: The brave mariner Sinbad battles raging elements, mutinous dogs and fearsome monsters to retrieve the Book of Peace after being framed by the treacherous Goddess of Chaos. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure With Scientists
programme.desc: An inept swashbuckler decides to make an attempt to win the Pirate of the Year Award, and beat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz in a race to plunder the most booty. His journey takes him to Victorian London where the Pirate Captain must choose between winning Pirate of the Year, or helping his crew.

programme.title: The Ogglies
programme.desc: Young Max meets the Ogglies, a family of green, garbage-eating creatures who live at the dump in the town of Smelliville. When a contractor plans to build a wellness temple at the dump, Max and his pal must hatch a plan to save the Ogglies home.

programme.title: Open Season 3
programme.desc: After Boog switches places with a circus bear, Elliott and the gang must rescue him before the circus returns home to Russia.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A pig, a mouse, a porcupine, a gorilla, an elephant and other animals gather at a koalas theatre for a singing competition.

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: Son of Memphis and Norma, little sweet penguin Mumble has a big problem: he cant sing a single note. In a world where everyone needs a heart song to attract a soul mate, Mumble feels he doesnt belong there. Our hero Mumble is the worst singer in the world, but he can tap dance brilliantly.

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: Mumbles son Erik hasnt yet found his talents, and he goes with his friends to Adelie-land which is ruled by a penguin who can fly. When Erik returns to Emperor-land and finds them trapped under big walls of ice. Will Erik be able to save his family and friends before it is too late?

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The plucky penguins join a special inter-species task force in an attempt to stop an evil doctor from taking over the world.

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: A family of ducks decides to leave the safety of a New England pond for an adventurous trip to Jamaica. However, their well-laid plans quickly go awry when they get lost and wind up in New York City.

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two rogues stumble across a map of the treasures of El Dorado and stow away on an explorers ship bound for South America, where they are mistaken for gods due to their foreign complexions. Narrated by Elton John, who provided the music to Tim Rices lyrics.

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
programme.desc: The brave mariner Sinbad battles raging elements, mutinous dogs and fearsome monsters to retrieve the Book of Peace after being framed by the treacherous Goddess of Chaos. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: Deep Sea
programme.desc: Swept into the sea during a family cruise, a young girl named Shenxiu stumbles upon a mysterious restaurant under the waves. There, she meets the scheming head chef and his ragtag crew of adorable otters and sarcastic walruses.

programme.title: Deep Sea
programme.desc: Swept into the sea during a family cruise, a young girl named Shenxiu stumbles upon a mysterious restaurant under the waves. There, she meets the scheming head chef and his ragtag crew of adorable otters and sarcastic walruses.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss; she cant remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that hes in it for love.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: After the highs of winning the world championships, the Bellas find themselves split apart. But when they get the chance to reunite for an overseas USO tour, this group of awesome nerds will come together to make some music one last time.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Billy is the son of hotel chain magnate Brian Madison and expects to inherit the family fortune, but hes shocked when his father stipulates he wont unless he passes 12th grade in just 24 weeks. It will be tough, since he never passed 1st grade. Determined to prove his father wrong, Billy enrols at school.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In an update of the 1966 Lewis Gilbert version, the eponymous Alfie is transposed to Manhattan and working as a chauffeur. His conquests include older woman Liz, lonely Nikki and Lonette, his best friends girl. However, he begins to learn bitter truths about himself and the way he treats women and, by the end of the film, he discovers a degree of humility.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A young female welder dreams of becoming a professional dancer and struggles against all the odds to realise her dream. However, in her effort to succeed, she discovers that getting to the top is far from easy. Giorgio Moroders composition `Flashdance (What a Feeling), sung by Irene Cara, won an Academy Award for Best Original Song.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music thats always been inside him.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Once the highly regarded composer to the Viennese Court, Salieri is now an old man, unknown and confined to an asylum. After a suicide attempt he recounts his story to a young cleric, going back 30 years to his heyday at the court of Emperor Joseph II, where he first met the young Mozart. Despite Salieris Machiavellian attempts to frustrate Mozarts progress, the great young composer attracts the favour of the Emperor.

programme.title: Calvary
programme.desc: An honest and good-hearted priest wrestles with a cynical and spiteful community after he receives a death threat from an unknown parishioner.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A young female welder dreams of becoming a professional dancer and struggles against all the odds to realise her dream. However, in her effort to succeed, she discovers that getting to the top is far from easy. Giorgio Moroders composition `Flashdance (What a Feeling), sung by Irene Cara, won an Academy Award for Best Original Song.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music thats always been inside him.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Once the highly regarded composer to the Viennese Court, Salieri is now an old man, unknown and confined to an asylum. After a suicide attempt he recounts his story to a young cleric, going back 30 years to his heyday at the court of Emperor Joseph II, where he first met the young Mozart. Despite Salieris Machiavellian attempts to frustrate Mozarts progress, the great young composer attracts the favour of the Emperor.

programme.title: Calvary
programme.desc: An honest and good-hearted priest wrestles with a cynical and spiteful community after he receives a death threat from an unknown parishioner.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Lenny Rubins has to put his dream retirement on hold when he is emotionally blackmailed into reuniting his estranged children.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Spoof spy caper with the eponymous, blundering hero attempting to recover the crown jewels and save Britain from an evil mastermind when all the other agents are killed. Promoted from lowly pen pusher to super spy, Johnny English is baffled when clues lead to respected entrepreneur Pascal Sauvage, but could the enigmatic Lorna hold the key to the mystery?

programme.title: Save The Cinema
programme.desc: Sky Original film following Welsh hairdresser Liz Evans fight to save her small towns theatre. Poignant British drama based on a true story starring Samantha Morton.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: Focusing on a young Willy Wonka and how he came to meet the Oompa-Loompas on one of his earliest adventures.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Lenny Rubins has to put his dream retirement on hold when he is emotionally blackmailed into reuniting his estranged children.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A young kid teams up with the niece of young adult horror author R.L. Stine after the writers imaginary demons are set free on the town of Greendale, Maryland.

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Endearing film version of Lionel Barts successful stage musical based on Dickenss tale of the fluctuating fortunes of an orphan boy. Ron Moody stands out as the wily old scrounger Fagin in a series of well-crafted set-pieces and atmospheric musical numbers, and a tribe of child stars brings the 19th-century London underworld vividly to life.

programme.title: Oliver!

Ron Moody stands out as the wily old scrounger Fagin in a series of well-crafted set-pieces and atmospheric musical numbers, and a tribe of child stars brings the 19th-century London underworld vividly to life.

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: Montgomery Brewster is a low-league baseball player who suddenly finds out that a distant relative has left him $300 million. However, theres a catch: he has to waste $30 million in just 30 days without anyone knowing hes doing it.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once hes had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newtons wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: A conflicted Navy pilot and veteran of the Second World War questions the role he is forced to play when he is called back into service for the Korean War.

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: Whimsical but engaging western about a drifter who saves a woman from a gang of marauders. The cowboy is astonished to learn that the woman is a nun, especially when he witnesses her heavy drinking and cigar-smoking ways. The unlikely pair embark on a voyage of discovery as they become embroiled in the Mexican War.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The violent story of a Mafia family fighting to establish supremacy in the American business world following World War II, where an assassination attempt leaves Vito Corleone too ill to run the family business, forcing his sons Michael and Sonny to lead the Corleones into a vendetta-filled war with other mob families.

programme.title: Midnight Express
programme.desc: Based on the true story of an American who endured the horrors of a Turkish prison after his arrest on drug charges.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: After showing signs of clairvoyance, New York City paramedic Cassandra Webb must confront revelations about her past and protect three young women from a mysterious adversary who wants them dead.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Mavis surprises Dracula with plans for a fun-filled summer voyage on a monster cruise. As the pack starts enjoying colossal buffets and exotic excursions, Drac finds himself falling for the ships intriguing but dangerous captain. He soon learns that trying to balance family, friends and romance might just be too much to handle. even for the worlds most powerful vampire.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Adaptation of the adventures of the swinging comic-strip hero. A shy student becomes a crime fighter after a bite from a mutant spider, during a school outing, gives him extraordinary powers. As he comes to terms with his new-found abilities, he is also forced to contend with a maniac villain known as the Green Goblin.

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The comic book web-slinger returns for a blockbusting sequel. Crime-fighting has cost Peter Parker his best friend and his true love Mary Jane. However, just as he quits as Spider-Man, New York comes under threat from Dr Octopus, a metal-tentacled madman. Peter has no choice but to swing back into action.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Life is sweet for Peter Parker, MJ loves him, her career is taking off and Spidey-mania is sweeping New York. However, when an alien parasite bonds to his suit, its not long before the good times and Spidey turn bad. While his ugly ego is taking centre stage, MJ is dumped from her Broadway show, Harry remembers Spider-Mans role in his fathers death, and Peter is consumed by revenge.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: After showing signs of clairvoyance, New York City paramedic Cassandra Webb must confront revelations about her past and protect three young women from a mysterious adversary who wants them dead.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: The Essex Murders: Who Killed Goldfinger?

programme.title: The Sleepwalker

programme.title: Costa Concordia: The Chronicle of a Disaster

programme.title: Klitschko: More Than a Fight

programme.title: QPR: The Four Year Plan
programme.desc: In 2007 Queens Park Rangers Football Club, facing relegation and bankruptcy, was rescued by four high-profile billionaires. Their vision: to take a community of reluctant fans, semi-talented players and a roster of ever-changing managers to Premiership glory. The new owners, risking ridicule and commercial failure, allowed cameras to record the extraordinary roller-coaster ride.

programme.desc: Dreams of a forbidden love affair haunt Lt Torres after the Voyager crew picks up Enaran passengers.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: In order to stabilise a severely injured humanoid who is found in the Enterprises escape pod, Geordi volunteers to have his nervous system linked to that of the stranger. However, the complicated process breaks down.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine
programme.desc: OBrien is forced to secretly alter equipment by an entity that has taken over Keikos body and threatens to kill her if he refuses.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted
programme.desc: The Fugitive Task Force launches into full gear after multiple bombings appear to be targeting retired NYPD officers; Ray decides hes ready to take the next step in his relationship with Cora.

programme.title: FBI: International
programme.desc: When a former member of the Irish Republican Army turned U.S. citizen is shot while in London with his son touring youth football academies, Smitty and the team work to hunt down the people responsible as the group becomes increasingly violent.

programme.title: Grimm
programme.desc: Nick is on the run, and a trail of murders leads to some shocking revelations about his past.

programme.title: Warehouse 13
programme.desc: Pete and Myka discover a dead Warehouse agent in the remains of an apparent gas explosion.

programme.title: Brit Cops: Frontline Crime UK
programme.desc: Take to the streets to fight crime with the British Police Force.

programme.title: The Force: North East
programme.desc: The dog unit deal with a man who has barricaded himself in his house with a Rottweiler inside. Plus a woman thought to have overdosed disappears.

programme.title: Supersenses
programme.desc: Discorver why and how some of the worlds most amazing animals use their special powers to survive in a diverse range of environments, and how they push the limits of engineering to achieve incredible feats that humans can only dream of.

programme.title: Supersenses
programme.desc: Compared to some animals, human senses are sorely limited. Beyond our scope of perception, there is an invisible world that humans know little about, but that some animals rely on in order to survive.

programme.title: Gangs Of Baboon Falls
programme.desc: As lockdown continues, the streets of Victoria Falls are empty, and the gangs must find new ways to survive in a strangely changed world.

programme.desc: Alison attempts to rescue a squirrel monkey, who proves to be something of an escape artist, and the newly arrived orangutan youngster Kayan meets with Bulu Mata for the first time.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: The park comes to the aid of two marmosets, leaving Alison shocked by the condition of the male, while Louisa reaches out the foot of friendship to male crush Matty the capuchin.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand
programme.desc: New Zealands West Coast is like nowhere else on Earth. From glacier-covered mountains to rain-drenched native forests to rough frigid seas, the landscape defies belief. Isolated from the rest of the world, this strip of almost untouched wilderness hides a host of endemic animals. Evolutionary castaways, every one of them is a rare ecological jewel. From alpine parrots and shy penguins to mammal-like kiwis and ancient eels.

programme.title: The Living Beach
programme.desc: Just beyond Australias Queensland State is Fraser Island, a complex ecosystem built entirely upon sand. In the middle of its rainforests, eucalyptus woodlands and mangrove forests, a visitor to Fraser Island is always standing upon the living beach.

programme.title: Killer Couples
programme.desc: "Killer Couples" is in the same vein of the long-running true-crime series "Snapped," which tells stories of people who commit murder or attempt murder, but with a focus on couples who commit crimes. Using re-creations and firsthand accounts, each episode digs into a case, telling the story of the couples romance, how the relationship evolved from love to manipulation, and what ultimately led the couple to commit the crime. The stories range from teenage lovers who go on a multistate crime spree to lesbian lovers who want to eliminate one of their husbands.

programme.title: Killer Couples
programme.desc: "Killer Couples" is in the same vein of the long-running true-crime series "Snapped," which tells stories of people who commit murder or attempt murder, but with a focus on couples who commit crimes. Using re-creations and firsthand accounts, each episode digs into a case, telling the story of the couples romance, how the relationship evolved from love to manipulation, and what ultimately led the couple to commit the crime. The stories range from teenage lovers who go on a multistate crime spree to lesbian lovers who want to eliminate one of their husbands.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo discovers how Minneapolis harnessed the awesome power of the Mighty Mississippi to become a great industrial centre, the Mill City of the nation. And he finds how the city became the artificial limb capital of the world.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.sub-title: Red Wing, Minnesota to Portage, Wisconsin
programme.desc: Michael continue his journey along the Mississippi to Red Wing, Minnesota. Picking up the Empire Builder rail service he travels to Winona, where he takes to the water to find out how the US Army Corps of Engineers made the Mississippi navigable.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek heads to North Yorkshire to pick up a veteran London-to-Brighton car, theres an emotional farewell to a 1980s Bedford HA van, and a Toyota Corona finds a new home.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek gives the once-over to a Royale Formula Ford race car, and Paul is on a marathon trip to Teesside to pick up a 1953 MGYB, a Moggy Van and an 80s Yamaha 250RD motorbike.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.desc: The Spanish island of Villa Winter, which was suspected of being a port for German U-boats and part of a larger plan to invade the United States.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters
programme.desc: An in-depth exploration of the assassination of one of the main architects of the Holocaust, Reinhard Heydrich, by British-trained Czechs.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team head to Cheshire for a day of busy valuations at Arley Hall and Gardens. Combing through the thousands of objects brought in by visitors the experts are excited to discover two different items that have spent many years hidden from view - a gold bracelet found mysteriously bricked up behind a wall that is linked to a tragic love story, and a time capsule, buried in 1886, is opened on camera to reveal its secrets 130 years later.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A return visit to the enchanting gardens of Arley Hall in Cheshire finds Fiona Bruce and the team of experts hard at work. Its a rich day of finds as family treasures come under scrutiny. Amongst the objects featured are a portrait of a visitors mother which was painted in India in the 1950s.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: There is a triple collection of desirable cars in store for Derek when an MG Midget, an Austin-Healey frogeye Sprite and an RS2000 come up for auction.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Daves son Jack is heading out to Cheshire to collect two cars with a 35-year age difference. And luckily for Mathewsons, Lucy knows exactly what has been brought in for auction.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.desc: The Spanish island of Villa Winter, which was suspected of being a port for German U-boats and part of a larger plan to invade the United States.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters

programme.title: Operation Arctic with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Kate meets the Inuit artists inspired by the changing world around them, while Simon heads off on a fishing expedition, Arctic style. In Churchill, Gordon finds out how the town deals with their more troublesome bears when he follows the eviction of a repeat offender.

programme.title: Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: On Sri Lanka, the Chinese are building a huge new port and their money has helped the Sri Lankan government bring a 30-year war to a brutal end. Simon Reeve also visits the north of the island - the scene of vicious battles between fighters from the Tamil minority and the Sri Lankan army. Heading north to Bangladesh, Simon investigates one of the Indian Oceans fastest growing industries - providing prawns.

programme.title: The Lakes with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon looks at the impact of humans on Englands biggest and most popular national park. He goes wild swimming in the crystal-clear lake of Buttermere, before taking a look at the less-fortunate Derwent Water.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: There is a triple collection of desirable cars in store for Derek when an MG Midget, an Austin-Healey frogeye Sprite and an RS2000 come up for auction.

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: Explores an industrial ruin in the Florida Everglades in the south of the United States that once competed in the greatest race humankind has ever witnessed: the mission to land on the Moon.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael begins in the port of Batumi on the dazzling Caucasian Riviera. He savours the soul of Georgia in its wine and discovers a surprise nineteenth century tea plantation in the West Georgian countryside. The seat of power beckons in Kutaisi, home to the wonderful glass dome built for the Parliament of Georgia when it moved here from the capital, Tbilisi, in 2012.

programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: The Ghazi Attack
programme.desc: In 1971, an Indian Naval submarine, S21, intercepts a Pakistani submarine, PNS Ghazi, in its water during a routine surveillance and thwarts its mission of destroying INS Vikrant.

programme.title: Bhuj: The Pride of India
programme.desc: During the Indo-Pakistani War, IAF squadron leader Vijay Karnik reconstructs a damaged landing strip in 72 hours with the help of local women.

programme.title: Khuddar
programme.desc: An inspector falls in love with a woman he previously misjudged.

programme.title: Khosla Ka Ghosla
programme.desc: Members of a dysfunctional family unite when a corrupt man steals the plot of land upon which their retired patriarch hoped to build his dream house.

programme.title: Dhol
programme.desc: Four broke and accident-prone men decide to court a rich girl hoping to that one of them will marry her and all will live their life in comfort.

programme.title: Kabhi Alvida Naa Kehna
programme.desc: A story of relationship turmoil that centres around a budding romance between Dev and Maya, who are both married to different people.

programme.title: Kaabil
programme.desc: Rohan is a kind, happy young man. Until one day, a terrible tragedy struck. Driven by the fire of vengeance, nothing will stop him. Not even the fact that he has been blind since birth.

programme.title: Grand Masti
programme.desc: Three married men go out for a night of fun during their college experience.

programme.title: Lamhe
programme.desc: Viren falls in love at first sight when he sees the beautiful Pallavi, but is too shy to let her know his feelings. He then realises she is in love with Siddharth, whom she goes on to marry. When Pallavi and Siddharth die in a car crash, Viren takes charge of their daughter Pooja. As the years pass, Viren and Pooja fall in love, but Viren is not prepared to accept his feelings for a girl so much younger than himself.

programme.title: Lamhe
programme.desc: Viren falls in love at first sight when he sees the beautiful Pallavi, but is too shy to let her know his feelings. He then realises she is in love with Siddharth, whom she goes on to marry. When Pallavi and Siddharth die in a car crash, Viren takes charge of their daughter Pooja. As the years pass, Viren and Pooja fall in love, but Viren is not prepared to accept his feelings for a girl so much younger than himself.

programme.desc: The head of a fertility clinic and sperm bank needs a reliable source of high-quality semen. As luck would have it, he comes into contact with Vicky Arora, an attractive Punjabi whom he convinces to become a donor. When Vicky falls in love and marries a Bengali called Ashima, their relationship takes a turn for the worse when it is discovered that she is infertile.

programme.desc: A fun-loving woman helps an aspiring singer fulfil his dreams.
